about_the_game:
A rage game that’s more than just a rage game. Dodge enemies, turrets, open doors, solve puzzles, get rewards and play with your friends.

Solve Puzzles!


Durus features a variety of puzzle elements that work together with obstacles to create an engaging and challenging experience.

Reflex-based obstacles


Master the art of faking out a turret, use your surroundings for cover and use their cooldowns against them.

Unique puzzle elements


Puzzle elements like the subatomic circle change the whole game by shrinking your player.

Tradition on its head


Shields in Durus are a puzzle element, they are not their to help you survive.

Game features

Multiplayer

Play through the game's campaign co-operatively with your friends online or on the couch.
Or show off your skills in versus mode.

Reflexes

Fine-tuned levels that will get you saying "no way that's possible!" without feeling unfair.

Puzzles

Take a breath from the frustration to engage your brain and solve deceptively simple puzzles.

Level Editor

Want to create the most infuriating level possible? Open our intuitive level editor and drag and drop until your vision is realised.

Workshop

Ready to share your creation? Looking for a new challenge after the campaign? Upload your own or browse the workshop for custom levels to play by yourself or with friends.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+)
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: A multiplayer rage game. Experience a rage-inducing reflex-based puzzle game on your own or with your friends. Work your way through a campaign at your own pace in casual, or dedicate your life to beating it on challenge mode. Build, play and share your own levels with a fully featured level editor.
